# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a collection view layout object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init()
```

## Return Value

An initialized collection view layout object.

## Creating the collection view layout

- **init(coder:)**: Creates a collection view layout object from data in a given unarchiver.
